events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days, and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The reported issue was identified as a Delivery Delay based on keywords related to late shipping and tracking concerns mentioned by the customer.
This case has been assigned to customer support representative Jessica for further assistance and follow-up on the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your concern regarding the delay, and I’m here to help you track down your order and resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address you used when placing the order? This will help me check the status more accurately.
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the email associated is customer@example.com. I appreciate you looking into this for me.

Thank you for the info. I checked the shipment, and it appears there was an unexpected delay at the courier's facility. We expect it to be delivered within the next three days, and I will send you tracking updates.
Thanks for the update and for checking on it quickly. I’m relieved to know it should arrive soon. I’ll wait for further updates.
Your package has been delivered according to the latest confirmation. Please let us know if you experience any further issues, and thank you for your patience during this delay.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived in good condition and that you’re satisfied with the solution provided. Feel free to reach out if you need any more help.
Since the delivery issue has been resolved and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email to gather your feedback on how we handled your case and to help us improve our service.
